::Zardus::

Zardus frowns, looking down at his wrist. He couls see light coming 
from inside his wrist compartment. Tapping it, he opens the 
compartment, taking out the disk.

"Delta?" he says to the bot standing near him, "Can you go and scan 
this disk in the Iron Fist? Diamond said that it may have weapon 
designs on it, we could use them."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> The disk that Diamond gave to Zardus had three little lights on the 
> side of the disk. They start blinking very quickly.
